dataTemplate.name: XXICMAppCntlMonitor
dataTemplate.description: R0040 This report will be used internally within the Internal Compliance team to view the summary of all the application control changes based on the parameters.

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT INSTANCE instance_name, "Reporting Group" reporting_group, "Setup Group" setup_group, "Setup Parameter" setup_parameter, "Organization Name" organization_name, "Organization Type" organization_type, "Prior Value" prior_value, "Recommended Value" recommended_value, "Current Value" current_value, "Last Updated By" last_updated_by, "Last Update Date" last_update_date, "User Name" user_name FROM xxod_icm_appl_ctrl_monitor_v xiacm WHERE (xiacm.instance = :p_instance_name OR :p_instance_name IS NULL) AND (xiacm."Reporting Group" = :p_reporting_group OR :p_reporting_group IS NULL) AND (xiacm."Setup Group" = :p_setup_group OR :p_setup_group IS NULL) AND (xiacm."Setup Parameter" = :p_setup_parameter OR :p_setup_parameter IS NULL) ORDER BY INSTANCE, "Reporting Group", "Setup Group", "Setup Parameter", "Organization Name", "Last Update Date"
